revision.text:
void '''PlayActiveSound''' ()
==Usage== Plays the {{Property|ActiveSound|active sound}} of the actor. The sound is played on the ''voice'' [[Sound channels|channel]] with no attenuation if the {{Flag|FULLVOLACTIVE}} flag is set on the actor, or with ''idle'' attenuation otherwise. The function does nothing if a sound is already playing on that channel, regardless of the means by which it was originally played.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
[[Category:DECORATE]] [[Category:ZScript]]
